Articles.Content:
KSP 0.90.0.705

No addons

I got an orbit around the mun with my spaceship and while doing EVA with kerbal I missclicked and retracked ladder while kerbal was still grabing it , when ladder retracked completly kerbal lost all his velocity till 0 while spaceship was still with the same velocity and at the same orbit , kerbal started falling at mun till crashed at surface. After this, game crashed and while I try to load this save I can't do anything in it, it loads only first building view but I can't click on any building to get into it, only science lab but can't go out of it and have to quit tha game with alt+F4 option , nothing else works.

save:

    http://speedy.sh/cmPGT/Takie-tam.rar

launcher data:

    http://speedy.sh/FhfY2/Launcher-Data.rar

That save is not very important to me so don't worry about it , I'm just posting so you can fix that bug faster ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

If you need any more game files just reply I will edit post with them.

My system(should be in files but don't know for sure):

Win7 HP, HD5850 x2 CrossFire , 8GB RAM 1600MHz , 1TB DDR , AMD Phenom II x955

Oh, thanks for the report. This might actually be helpful for some other things I'm working on too. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Welcome to the forums!

Cheers,

~Claw
